Title: When algorithms go wrong, who is liable?
Abstract: © 2017 The Royal Statistical SocietyAs automated decisions affect more and different areas of our lives, we are faced with ethical and legal questions that are likely to change the way we think about algorithms and the law. By Sofia Olhede and Patrick Wolfe.
